mapper.select: SELECT article_id AS articleId, title, description, post_date AS postDate, view_count AS viewCount FROM blog_article LIMIT #{startIndex},#{pageSize}

SELECT ba.article_id AS articleId, ba.title, ba.description, ba.post_date AS postDate, ba.view_count AS viewCount FROM blog_mid_category_article mca JOIN blog_category bc ON mca.category_name = bc.`name` JOIN blog_article ba ON mca.article_id = ba.article_id WHERE bc.`name` = #{categoryName}
